rule-22-31-a.test_description: The project has one building segment with two zones.  HVAC is system type 7 and is correctly modeled with 1 chiller when the cooling peak load is 300 tons or less.  Expected result: PASS

standard.rule_description: The baseline building design’s chiller plant shall be modeled with chillers having the number as indicated in Table G3.1.3.7 as a function of building peak cooling load

rule-22-31-b.test_description: The project has one building segment with two zones.  HVAC is system type 7 and is inccorrectly modeled with 2 chillers when the cooling peak load is 300 tons or less.  Expected result: FAIL

standard.rule_description: The baseline building design’s chiller plant shall be modeled with chillers having the number as indicated in Table G3.1.3.7 as a function of building peak cooling load

rule-22-31-c.test_description: The project has one building segment with two zones.  HVAC is system type 7b and is correctly modeled with 2 chillers when the cooling peak load is between 300 -> 600 tons.  Expected result: PASS

standard.rule_description: The baseline building design’s chiller plant shall be modeled with chillers having the number as indicated in Table G3.1.3.7 as a function of building peak cooling load

rule-22-31-d.test_description: The project has one building segment with two zones.  HVAC is system type 7 and is incorrectly modeled with 1 chiller when the cooling peak load is between 300 -> 600 tons.  Expected result: FAIL

standard.rule_description: The baseline building design’s chiller plant shall be modeled with chillers having the number as indicated in Table G3.1.3.7 as a function of building peak cooling load

rule-22-31-e.test_description: The project has one building segment with two zones.  HVAC is system type 7 and is correctly modeled with 3 chillers when the cooling peak load is 2400 tons.  Expected result: PASS

standard.rule_description: The baseline building design’s chiller plant shall be modeled with chillers having the number as indicated in Table G3.1.3.7 as a function of building peak cooling load

rule-22-31-f.test_description: The project has one building segment with two zones.  HVAC is system type 7 and is incorrectly modeled with 2 chillers when the cooling peak load is 2400 tons.  Expected result: FAIL

standard.rule_description: The baseline building design’s chiller plant shall be modeled with chillers having the number as indicated in Table G3.1.3.7 as a function of building peak cooling load

rule-22-31-g.test_description: The project has one building segment with two zones.  HVAC is system type 5.  Expected result: Not Applicable

standard.rule_description: The baseline building design’s chiller plant shall be modeled with chillers having the number as indicated in Table G3.1.3.7 as a function of building peak cooling load
